Text:
Hey, eagerforcc. This looks good but I'm confused about step 6. Your instructions say enter command:

D(rive):CD BOOT enter
and then:
CD BOOT enter

Is this correct or is this a typo?
Thanks, this looks real handy.

This is the write content from the guide:-
D: CD BOOT and hit enter.Where âDâ is your DVD drive letter.
CD BOOT and hit enter .
Please follow instruction carefully.

Thank you. I was afraid that the second CD BOOT was a typo and I wanted to be sure. Better safe than sorry. Once again, thanks for sharing.

BTW, will this also work for XP and if not can you tell me why not. I also appreciate this info.

I will also post this reply to your other link in case anyone else is also curious.

Thank you.
